repos_data.description: Read-only mirror of Wireshark's Git repository at https://gitlab.com/wireshark/wireshark. ⚠️ GitHub won't let us disable pull requests. ⚠️ THEY WILL BE IGNORED HERE ⚠️ Upload them at GitLab instead.

Advanced Zsh autocomplete plugin for TShark that provides protocol-aware, hierarchical completion for display filters and extracted fields, enabling Wireshark-like field discovery directly from the command line.
